name: Worn Diary
pages:
Dear diary that alleviates my loneliness,

It's only been a few days since my departure, and yet I already miss that kind gentleman.

I never expected to learn such a wonderful melody from a person in such
eccentric armor, but now I absolutely must introduce it to my people!
A storm is approaching, but fear not, dear diary, even the weather can't harm me now! I will play this song until the end of the world!
